about.name: Name
about.current_position: Current Position: Frontend Developer at Barrage d.o.o.

languages.title: Languages
languages.croatian: Croatian - Native language, the highest level of speaking, listening and writing
languages.english: English - A2-A1 level of speaking, listening and writing

early_years.title: Early Years
early_years.text: I was born in Našice, a charming small town in eastern Croatia near Osijek. From an early age, I displayed a deep interest in technology, fueled by an innate curiosity about how things work and a passion for problem-solving.

primary.title: Primary School: Dora Pejačević Elementary School, Našice
primary.text: I completed all eight years of primary education with top honors, consistently excelling in my studies and demonstrating a strong affinity for computers and technology.

secondary.title: Secondary School: Isidor Kršnjavi High School, Našice
secondary.text: I pursued an education in electrical engineering, a natural choice given my interest in technology. During these years, I honed my skills by working at a local computer shop during the summers. My responsibilities included assembling and repairing computers, laptops, and mobile devices, as well as dabbling in programming fundamentals.

higher.title: Higher Education: Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Computer Science and Information Technology (FERIT), Osijek
higher.text: While working as a waiter in Našice’s most renowned pub, I enrolled in the computer science program at FERIT. This marked the start of my formal journey into the IT world, where I successfully earned the title of bacc. ing. comp. (Bachelor of Computer Engineering).

barrage.title: Frontend Developer - Barrage d.o.o., Osijek
barrage.text1: Full-time role during studies and post-graduation: 2021 - still working
barrage.text2: I joined Barrage as a frontend developer, primarily working with Vue.js and Nuxt.js. My role also extended to projects involving React and Next.js, providing valuable exposure to cutting-edge web development frameworks.
barrage.before_projects: During my tenure at Barrage, I contributed to numerous high-impact projects, including:

project1.title: OneHub
project1.text: A collaborative project for T-Com, the leading telecom provider in Croatia, in partnership with Deutsche Telekom.

project2.title: Travelspot
project2.text: A unique brand under Barrage’s portfolio, showcasing innovative and scalable web solutions for business traveling.

barrage.text3: Beyond my primary responsibilities, I have consistently sought opportunities to enhance my skills, delve into new technologies, and contribute to both company and personal projects.

text4.first_part: You can check my other projects

private_projects.title: Private Projects
private_projects.text: Throughout my academic and professional career, I have been deeply committed to private initiatives that allowed me to realize personal and external ideas while refining my technical skills. These projects solidified my expertise as a full-stack developer with proficiency in:

personal_qualities.title: Personal Qualities
personal_qualities.text1: I am a highly ambitious and dedicated individual who thrives on challenges and constantly seeks opportunities to grow. I take pride in my ability to meet deadlines, learn new languages and frameworks, and push the boundaries of what I can achieve. Whether as part of a team or independently, I bring enthusiasm, reliability, and a results-driven mindset to every task.
personal_qualities.text2: I am eager to leverage my skills and passion for technology to make meaningful contributions, achieve organizational goals, and continue advancing in the ever-evolving world of IT.

onehub.title: T-com OneHub
onehub.description: Application of the leading Croatian telecom operator in cooperation with Deutsche Telekom, which unites 11 different business-user services into one - company, still developing

travelspot.title: Travelspot
travelspot.description: An application for the complete organization of a business trip with transportation, accommodation and other key things related to the trip - company

ragu.title: Ragu
ragu.description: An open-source platform that enables customizable AI agents. Agents can be trained by uploading files (PDF, Word, etc.) to improve their knowledge and conversational abilities. Administrators can adjust the language and behavior of agents via a back-office interface, while users communicate with approved agents and manage multiple conversations simultaneously. The platform also supports WhatsApp integration, with a primary agent designated for mobile communication - company, still developing

roango.title: Roango
roango.description: An application for searching for talents & jobs, and compiling works - company

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: An application for managing skills and faster finding workers with certain skills. It is also possible to reward each other with Hedera coins - company, access requires VPN

agro_app.title: AgroApp
agro_app.description: An application that includes keeping books, papers and records for all branches of agronomy (16 of them) in accordance with Croatian laws, and exporting and printing them - private, still develpoing

wedding_application.title: Wedding Application
wedding_application.description: An application intended to be used as a wedding invitation and later for uploading official and unofficial images. Private images of wedding guests can be uploaded via a specific QR code or from the side of the administrator (photo staff or newlyweds) - private, still develpoing, not deployed yet

holy_book.title: Holy Book
holy_book.description: Application that was made to manage debts in a handball club - private, need some time to start backend server

student_monday.title: Student Monday
student_monday.description: An application that is made for society. To manage arrivals, laws and members - private

affiliate_marketing.title: Affiliate Marketing
affiliate_marketing.description: Application for creating your own online affiliate web shop with adding categories and subcategories and with automatic loading of product data from the affiliate link - private, not maintained for a long time

pokemons.title: Pokemons
pokemons.description: Pokemon name guesser trial app - private

the_purple_hat.title: The Purple Hat
the_purple_hat.description: Application for ordering food and drinks inside the restaurant with logging by scanning the QR code from the table. Waiters can also keep a live order status - private, not maintained

chinese_food.title: Chinese Food
chinese_food.description: Test application for ordering food and drinks inside the restaurant - private, not maintained, one of my first apps

github_repository.title: GitHub Repository
github_repository.description: Most of my other applications/projects are available on my GitHub repository
